title: Prohibits payment of bonuses to employees and board members of state authorities
summary: Prohibits payment of bonuses to employees and board members of state authorities.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          519

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sen. MAZIARZ -- read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on Corporations,  Authorities
         and Commissions

       AN  ACT  to amend the public authorities law, in relation to prohibiting
         bonuses for employees of public authorities

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  The  public  authorities  law  is amended by adding a new
    2  section 2854 to read as follows:
    3    S  2854.  PROHIBITION  ON  PAYMENT  OF  BONUSES.  NOTWITHSTANDING  ANY
    4  PROVISION  OF  LAW, COMPENSATION PAID OR OTHERWISE PROVIDED TO EMPLOYEES
    5  OF STATE AUTHORITIES SHALL BE LIMITED TO SALARY AND BENEFITS  COMPARABLE
    6  TO  THOSE BENEFITS PROVIDED TO CIVIL SERVICE EMPLOYEES, AND, IF APPLICA-
    7  BLE, REIMBURSEMENT OF EXPENSES. NO BONUS OF ANY NATURE SHALL BE PAID  TO
    8  ANY EMPLOYEE OR BOARD MEMBER OF A STATE AUTHORITY PROVIDED THAT ANY SUCH
    9  PROHIBITION SHALL ONLY APPLY TO EMPLOYEES NOT COVERED UNDER A NEGOTIATED
   10  CONTRACT.
   11    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD01216-01-1
